abstract: News of pop culture phenomenon Michael Jackson’s death ricocheted around the Internet, causing several Web sites to crash as people searched for news and expressed their grief.
snippet: News of pop culture phenomenon Michael Jackson’s death ricocheted around the Internet, causing several Web sites to crash as people searched for news and expressed their grief.
lead_paragraph: Update | 11:27 p.m.  Comment from Biz Stone, co-founder of Twitter included below.

headline.main: Michael Jackson Tops the Charts on Twitter
